com.google.glass.samples.waveform

Class Global

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.glass.samples.waveform.Global

  • public class Global
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores all the variables that will be static during runtime
    Author:
    Adrian Jimenez-Galindo

      • setHeadingAndPitch

        public static void setHeadingAndPitch(float[] vec)
        Takes a vector @param vec and extracts the corresponding raw heading and pitch of the vector. Heading is processed as heading = -2*(toDegrees(value of vector)), for heading in range [-360, -25) U (25, 360]. Pitch is rounded and negated: -1*(round(value of vector)), for pitch in range (-30, 40). Both values are floats.
        Parameters:
        vec - : Ideally, the rotation vector obtained from the gyroscope.

      • Push

        public static void Push(float y,
                        float[] array)
        Add @param y to the end of the @param array, shifting all values to the beginning
        Parameters:
        y - : the value to be added to the array
        array - : the array

      • resetGlobals

        public static void resetGlobals()
        Returns all values to its default value
